mapper.insert:
insert into zy-community.sys_logininfor(user_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, msg, login_time) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.ipaddr}, #{entity.loginLocation}, #{entity.browser}, #{entity.os}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.msg}, #{entity.loginTime})

insert into zy-community.sys_logininfor(user_name, ipaddr, login_location, browser, os, status, msg, login_time) values
(#{entity.userName}, #{entity.ipaddr}, #{entity.loginLocation}, #{entity.browser}, #{entity.os}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.msg}, #{entity.loginTime})
on duplicate key update user_name = values(user_name) , ipaddr = values(ipaddr) , login_location = values(login_location) , browser = values(browser) , os = values(os) , status = values(status) , msg = values(msg) , login_time = values(login_time)
